channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- NetExtender
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- NetExtender

item.title: CVE-2023-44217|2024-09-20T18:42:40.087Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in SonicWall Net Extender MSI client for Windows 10.2.336 and earlier versions allows a local low-privileged user to gain system privileges through running repair functionality.

item.title: CVE-2023-44218|2024-09-20T19:02:17.400Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: A flaw within the SonicWall NetExtender Pre-Logon feature enables an unauthorized user to gain access to the host Windows operating system with 'SYSTEM' level privileges, leading to a local privilege escalation (LPE) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-07-19T03:55:38.296Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall SMA100 NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-07-18T16:38:47.259Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall SMA100 NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-07-18T07:37:12.258Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall SMA100 NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.
